data.title: SPFX webpart not added to site after deployment
data.meta_description:
I have developed a SPFx WebPart using react.  When packaging this solution, I use the following commands:
gulp clean
gulp bundle --ship
gulp package-solution --ship

FYI, I'm using these options in...
data.text:
I have developed a SPFx WebPart using react. When packaging this solution, I use the following commands:

gulp clean gulp bundle --ship gulp package-solution --ship

FYI, I'm using these options in my package-solution.json file:

"skipFeatureDeployment": true, "includeClientSideAssets": true, "isDomainIsolated": true,

It's worth noting, I've tried both with tenant deployment (skipFeatureDeployment = true/false) and without, same issue.

This successfully creates my .sppkg file. No errors.

I then upload the package to my SharePoint sites App Catalog in SharePoint Online (365), successfully, with no errors, then choose deploy, in this case to all sites:

The app is enabled, valid, deployed and tenant deployed:

The app does NOT show up in my site contents. The app does NOT show up in "My apps" for the site. The app does NOT show up in the WebPart picker of a page. If I create a simple helloworld app scaffolded from yo, it works as expected.
